memberdef.name: POZYX_INT_STATUS
memberdef.initializer: 0x5 /* Indicates the source of the interrupt. */

memberdef.name: POZYX_POS_NUM_ANCHORS
memberdef.initializer: 0x17 /* Configure the number of anchors and selection procedure */

memberdef.name: POZYX_POS_INTERVAL
memberdef.initializer: 0x18 /* Defines the update interval in ms in continuous positioning. */

memberdef.name: POZYX_UWB_RATES
memberdef.initializer: 0x1D /* Configure the UWB datarate and pulse repetition frequency (PRF) */

memberdef.name: POZYX_UWB_GAIN
memberdef.initializer: 0x1F /* Configure the power gain for the UWB transmitter */

memberdef.name: POZYX_UWB_XTALTRIM
memberdef.initializer: 0x20 /* Trimming value for the uwb crystal. */

memberdef.name: POZYX_OPERATION_MODE
memberdef.initializer: 0x22 /* Configure the mode of operation of the pozyx device */

memberdef.name: POZYX_SENSORS_MODE
memberdef.initializer: 0x23 /* Configure the mode of operation of the sensors */

memberdef.name: POZYX_POS_X
memberdef.initializer: 0x30 /* x-coordinate of the device in mm. */

memberdef.name: POZYX_POS_Y
memberdef.initializer: 0x34 /* y-coordinate of the device in mm. */

memberdef.name: POZYX_POS_Z
memberdef.initializer: 0x38 /* z-coordinate of the device in mm. */

memberdef.name: POZYX_DEVICE_LIST_SIZE
memberdef.initializer: 0x81 /* Returns the number of devices stored internally */

memberdef.name: POZYX_RX_NETWORK_ID
memberdef.initializer: 0x82 /* The network id of the latest received message */

memberdef.name: POZYX_RX_DATA_LEN
memberdef.initializer: 0x84 /* The length of the latest received message */

memberdef.name: POZYX_LED_CTRL
memberdef.initializer: 0xB1 /* Control LEDS 1 to 4 on the board */

memberdef.name: POZYX_TX_DATA
memberdef.initializer: 0xB2 /* Write data in the UWB transmit (TX) buffer */

memberdef.name: POZYX_TX_SEND
memberdef.initializer: 0xB3 /* Transmit the TX buffer to some other pozyx device */

memberdef.name: POZYX_RX_DATA
memberdef.initializer: 0xB4 /* Read data from the UWB receive (RX) buffer */

memberdef.name: POZYX_POS_SET_ANCHOR_IDS
memberdef.initializer: 0xB7 /* Set the list of anchor ID's used for positioning. */

memberdef.name: POZYX_POS_GET_ANCHOR_IDS
memberdef.initializer: 0xB8 /* Read the list of anchor ID's used for positioning. */

memberdef.name: POZYX_FLASH_RESET
memberdef.initializer: 0xB9 /* Reset a portion of the configuration in flash memory */

memberdef.name: POZYX_FLASH_SAVE
memberdef.initializer: 0xBA /* Store a portion of the configuration in flash memory */

memberdef.name: POZYX_FLASH_DETAILS
memberdef.initializer: 0xBB /* Return information on what is stored in flash */

memberdef.name: POZYX_DEVICES_GETIDS
memberdef.initializer: 0xC0 /* Get all the network IDs's of devices in the device list. */

memberdef.name: POZYX_DEVICES_DISCOVER
memberdef.initializer: 0xC1 /* Obtain the network ID's of all pozyx devices within range. */

memberdef.name: POZYX_DEVICES_CALIBRATE
memberdef.initializer: 0xC2 /* Obtain the coordinates of the pozyx (anchor) devices within range. */

memberdef.name: POZYX_DEVICES_CLEAR
memberdef.initializer: 0xC3 /* Clear the list of all pozyx devices. */

memberdef.name: POZYX_DEVICE_ADD
memberdef.initializer: 0xC4 /* Add a pozyx device to the devices list */

memberdef.name: POZYX_DEVICE_GETINFO
memberdef.initializer: 0xC5 /* Get the stored device information for a given pozyx device */

memberdef.name: POZYX_DEVICE_GETCOORDS
memberdef.initializer: 0xC6 /* Get the stored coordinates of a given pozyx device */

memberdef.name: POZYX_DEVICE_GETRANGEINFO
memberdef.initializer: 0xC7 /* Get the stored range inforamation of a given pozyx device */

memberdef.name: POZYX_CIR_DATA
memberdef.initializer: 0xC8 /* Get the channel impulse response (CIR) coefficients */
